summary: Integration test suite that validates Conan's build-require functionality across diverse scenarios, including version tracking, overrides, transitive dependencies, version specifications, user/channel constraints, profile and tool requirements, source layout handling, installation processes, relocatable toolchains, and compiler-specific toolchain packages.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and correctness of Conan's package manager build-require mechanisms to prevent regressions and provide developers with predictable dependency resolution and toolchain integration.
